tool.name: WAAFLE genecaller
tool.description: Identify gene coordinates of interest directly from the BLAST output produced in the previous step

param.name: Contigs_Blastout
param.label: Contigs Blastout results from the first step

tool.help:
Optional step, identified in the documentation as Step 1.5
If the user chooses not to provide a GFF file along with their contigs, WAAFLE can identify gene coordinates of interest directly from the BLAST output produced in the previous step
**Inputs** ==========
The input for this step is the output of the first step
**Output** ===========
This step produces a file in GFF format called contigs.gff for use in the next and last WAAFLE step
.. _Tutorial: https://github.com/biobakery/biobakery/wiki/WAAFLE/ .. _User_Manual: https://github.com/biobakery/waafle/ .. _User_Forum: https://forum.biobakery.org/c/microbial-community-profiling/waafle/
